Desc.entry: A service run by Sheffield law firm Wake Smith & Tofields set up to provide free initial legal consultations to the city's creative and digital industries, ICT and e-business sectors. The portal has been running for 10 years providing an opportunity at an early stage for business owners and directors to discuss legal and business issues. The initial consultation is free and subjects covered have included: software protection; project contracts or tendering processes; corporate set up and governance; web design disputes; digital rights licenses and branding issues.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Last Thurs in the month 12noon-2pm, please contact to make an appointment
